snippet: Federal agents arrested nine people and seized more than $65 million in cash and assets said to be linked to drug gangs through California fashion district businesses.
abstract: Justice Department officials report that federal agents conducted series of raids across fashion district of Los Angeles, sweeping more than 70 locations, arresting nine people and seizing at least $65 million in cash and assets from businesses with ties to Mexican drug cartels.
lead_paragraph: Federal agents arrested nine people and seized more than $65 million in cash and assets said to be linked to drug gangs through California fashion district businesses.

headline.main: Los Angeles Sees Raids Over Ties to Cartels
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Sees Raids Over Ties to Cartels
